name: Atlas
short_description:
The latest changes in the world economy made money much more important topic than it was. The cost efficiency and reconstructions gained special attention. These themes became important not only at corporate but also at familial and personal levels. More and more people ask themselves, "Can I allow this to myself?" or "How much do I spend to my car?". This Android application would like to help to answer these.

The application is able to determine the type and amount of the money flow about the confirmation text messages (SMS) and visualizes theses information. Its objective to aid the user to overview his/her short and long term financial states and progresses and give support for future decisions, such as larger costs, debts, credits and reductions. Furthermore the application helps the user to be able to go throught these stages.

    Realization of the cost unefficiency
    Finding the source of the previous one
    Elimination of the source
    Eliminate all the sour
